alert.note: Alert for Chester; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chester and southeastern York Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 314 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Rock Hill, or 4 miles southwest of Lesslie, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, Lesslie, Catawba, Richburg and Edgemoor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
